name: Shrimp and Gravy
author: HardCore_Momma
summary: Delicious brown gravy with shrimp! Easy recipe, good over grits or rice! This can be made with either bacon or ham.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Place the bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Remove bacon and set aside, leaving the grease in the skillet
Reduce the heat to medium and add the onions to the pan
In a small bowl or cup, stir together the flour and water
Pour into the pan with the onions; cook, stirring constantly, until gravy has thickened
Stir in the bouillon cube, garlic salt, chives, salt and pepper
Return the bacon to the skillet, and add the shrimp
Cook for 5 to 10 minutes, until shrimp are pink and opaque
Serve over grits, biscuits or rice
